name: Promwad Mobile
tag_list: mobile-application-development, top-mobile-developer, ios-application-development, develop-ios-application, develop-iphone-application, develop-ipad-application, develop-android-application, deveop-windows-phone-application, mobile-applications-for-bankin
overview:
Promwad Mobile is centered on creation of software for mobile devices running on iOS, Android, Windows Phone platforms. The applications are made for industries ranging from banking to entertainment, having the ability to approach complex tasks innovatively and professionally.Linux kernel expertise allows Promwad to offer customers its system level programming services for devices running Android: televisions, car computers, navigation systems, smart home, point of sale systems.

We create: Advertising: corporate, promotional and coupon apps Financial, money management, payment transferring applications Travel, entertainment and leisure applications Social networking and blogging apps Navigation and Geo location apps Business apps for planning and management

Among our clients are companies worldwide, US, Western and Eastern Europe.
